content: This one's solvable with exact this₁ a h₄ h₂ rfl, fwiw. You seem to have ended up in a somewhat strange situation, though, so maybe there's a better approach if you step back a bit.
Thank you for your solution! Which part is strange?
Do you mean requiring a to solve/find contradiction?
Shadman Sakib has marked this topic as resolved.

I suspect what Ruben meant is that your "minimal" example is very very far from being minimal and your discussion of it seems to bring up the irrelevant integer n whereas what you actually seem to be asking is how to get a contradiction from 0<a<1 in a rather convoluted way
